reviewText: I happily paid the $4.95 to be able to show this excellent film on VHS.  My students are better for having seen it, giving them an insight into the Anasazi origins and culture.  However, the DVD, which I would rather have had was $79.95 and way too much for this teacher's budget.  If you still have a VHS hookup with your tech, the VHS is the right choice.
